cta.description: Xiaomi SU7, the latest addition to our electric vehicle lineup, brings a whole new level of innovation and performance to the table.

slides.title: Refined Exterior
slides.description: The Xiaomi SU7 features sleek contours, a unique ducktail spoiler, and a low-drag coefficient of 0.195, delivering both striking design and peak efficiency.

slides.title: Comfortable and Smart Interior
slides.description: A symmetrical cabin with ergonomic elements, a tri-spoke D-shaped steering wheel, and advanced HUD ensures comfort and focused driving.

slides.title: Unmatched Performance
slides.description: With rapid 0-200 km/h acceleration in 10.67 seconds and fast-charging capabilities offering up to 510 km in 15 minutes, the Xiaomi SU7 redefines EV standards.

slides.title: Xiaomi Pilot Pro: Cutting-Edge Autonomous Driving
slides.description: Powered by 11 cameras and NVIDIA DRIVE Orin, Xiaomi Pilot Pro ensures seamless and advanced autonomous driving experiences.

slides.title: Smart Cabin Technology: Human × Car × Home
slides.description: The 16.1-inch screen, 5-screen linkage, and support for Xiaomi smart home devices create a connected, intuitive driving ecosystem.

slides.title: Safety First
slides.description: A steel-aluminum alloy cage and 360° active safety systems provide robust protection for unmatched peace of mind.

feaures_section.title: Exploring Spesifications, Performance Product
feaures_section.description: Xiaomi SU7, the latest addition to our electric vehicle lineup, brings a whole new level of innovation and performance to the table.

items.label: Parking aids
items.value: Front and rear sensors, 360 camera, reversing camera, Automatic Parking Assistance System

items.label: Airbags
items.value: Front, side, rear, head airbag system

footer.location_uae_address: Auto China, Umm Suqeim St - Al Quoz, Dubai
footer.about_description: Auto China, with over 20 years of automotive expertise, is the fastest-growing car company in China, with a strong presence in Europe, the Middle East, and beyond. We lead the industry with sleek designs and innovative technology, creating cars that offer both luxury and smart features. Our commitment to excellence drives us to set new standards in performance and style, shaping the future of mobility. Experience the next level of automotive innovation with Auto China.

Liability for Content
As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 para. 1 TMG under general laws. However, according to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored external information or to search for circumstances indicating illegal activity.
Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general laws remain unaffected. Liability in this regard, however, is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific legal infringement. Upon becoming aware of such legal violations, we will remove this content immediately.

Liability for Links
Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no control. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the linked sites is always responsible for their content. The linked sites were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. Permanent monitoring of the linked sites’ content, however, is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation of the law. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.

Copyright
The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to the copyright laws of the United Arab Emirates. Duplication, processing, distribution, and any kind of utilization outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.

Dispute Resolution
The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/ We are neither willing nor obligated to participate in dispute resolution procedures before a consumer arbitration board.

privacy_policy:
Privacy Policy for Auto China

Introduction
Welcome to Auto China ("we," "our," or "us"). Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting the personal information you share with us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, https://auto-china.com("Website").
By accessing or using our Website, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our Website.


Information We Collect

1. Personal Information
Name
Email address
Phone number
Shipping and billing addresses
Payment information (for purchases)

2. Non-Personal Information
We automatically collect certain information when you visit our Website, including:
IP address
Browser type
Device type
Pages viewed
Referring URL
Time and date of access

3. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our Website. These may include:
Session cookies to maintain your login status
Analytics cookies to monitor site performance
Advertising cookies to deliver personalized ads


How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for the following purposes:

1. To Provide Services
Process your orders and payments
Deliver products and services
Respond to your inquiries

2. To Improve Our Website
Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience
Monitor website performance

3. Marketing and Advertising
Deliver personalized advertisements through Google Ads
Inform you about new products, services, or promotions

4. Compliance with Legal Obligations
Fulfill legal and regulatory requirements


Third-Party Services

1. Google Analytics
We use Google Analytics to track and analyze Website traffic. Google Analytics collects data such as:
Pages visited
Time spent on the Website
User interactions
This information helps us understand user behavior and improve our Website. Google Analytics may use cookies to gather data. For more information, visit Google’s Privacy Policy.

2. Google Ads
We use Google Ads to deliver personalized advertisements based on your browsing behavior. Google Ads may use cookies and other technologies to provide targeted ads. You can manage your ad preferences through Google’s Ad Settings.

Sharing Your Information
We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. However, we may share your information with third parties in the following cases:
With service providers that assist in operating our Website
To comply with legal obligations
To protect the rights and safety of our users


Your Rights and Choices You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

1. Access and Correction
You may request access to or correction of your personal data.

2. Opt-Out
You can disable cookies through your browser settings.
Opt-out of Google Analytics by installing the Google Analytics Opt-Out Browser Add-On.
Manage ad preferences through Google’s Ad Settings.

3. Data Deletion
You can request the deletion of your personal data by contacting us.

Data Security
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

Children’s Privacy
Our Website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

Changes to This Privacy Policy
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated date at the top.


Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

Auto China
Email: support@auto-china.com
Address: Auto China, Umm Suqeim - Al Quoz, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
